page.title: 05BEDFORD NORTH
page.content: At a point where the Goldington {residential}part of Bedford meets the similiar Putnoe area, you can see Bedford{College of Education}for {teacher training.}Some students live in the tower block rooms from the top of which fine views can be seen over Bedford, showing a number of green patches among the houses and streets and ending in distant green hills, such as the one on the{Mowsbury {Municipal Golf Course. If you walk from here westwards, you pass through our lovely{Bedford Park of wide grass expanse, fine variety of trees and many delightful shrubs. A {shallow pond}at this end is sometimes used by school children as a place for {nature studies.}Not far away is a children's well-kept{play area}of swings, slide, climbing frame and other similiar amenities.
